channel.title: 98% Special Attacks... Errors... HELP!
channel.description:
Hey, I'm trying to add specials to my server so I followed this tut:
[URL=http://"http://www.google/showthread.php?t=17780"]http://www.google/showthread.php?t=17780[/URL] Replace google with rune(ignore this)-server
So I followed everything correct hopefully, and then compiled and saved and I get this...
[CODE]client.java:24145: illegal start of type if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) { ^ client.java:24145: <identifier> expected if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) { ^ client.java:24145: <identifier> expected if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) { ^ client.java:24145: <identifier> expected if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) { ^ client.java:24145: illegal start of type if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) { ^ client.java:24153: illegal start of type
if (usingSpecial == true) {
^ client.java:24153: <identifier> expected
if (usingSpecial == true) {
^ 7 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/CODE]
Any1 know?
I'll be willing to post parts of my client.java... And I will R3P++ who ever makes it work... :d

item.title: 98% Special Attacks... Errors... HELP!
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Where does it say not to talk about rep? I thought it was that you couldn’t ask for rep… You can say that you’ll rep though… God of Ikiliki or whatever was on one of my topics while I said I would rep whoever and he never locked it… He was on the topic cuz another person like your was all like, you can’t ask for rep!.. (But if I’m wrong then that’s messed up, cuz I remember when that happened…)

Now can some1 actually fricken help!!! I’m tired of this place just going in circles and just saying useless stuff…

Read full topic

item.title: 98% Special Attacks... Errors... HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Helbound Helbound
item.description:
@Helbound wrote:

Please do not talk about rep. It is against the rules, in case you do not know. And, the url is-
http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=17780
Also, as for the error, I dk for sure. Maybe you forgot to declare something. I would need to see your client.java to be able to see exactly whats wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: 98% Special Attacks... Errors... HELP!
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Here are the codes I have around it…

[code]else if(spellID == 12445) // teleblock (lvl 85 spell)
if(playerLevel[6] >= 85)
{
startAnimation(1819);
castOnPlayer.Teleblock();
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 10;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 85)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 85 to cast this spell.”);
}
// end of modern spells - xerozcheez
//castOnPlayer.currentHealth -= castOnPlayer.hitDiff;
}
if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) {
hitDiff = EnemyHP;
}

                                    mageXP = (hitDiff * 500);
                                    addSkillXP(mageXP, 6);
                                    addSkillXP(hitDiff, 3);

				castOnPlayer.hitDiff = hitDiff;
				castOnPlayer.KillerId = playerId;
				castOnPlayer.updateRequired = true;
				castOnPlayer.hitUpdateRequired = true;
					}
					
				if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) {
					hitDiff = EnemyHP;
				}
				
				
				
				
				
									if (usingSpecial == true) {
				if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 && specialAmount >= 50) {
				animation(341, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
				calculateSpecial();
				hitDiff = specialDamage;
				usingSpecial = false;
				specialDamage = 0;
				specialDamage2 = 0;
				}
				if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1305 && specialAmount >= 50) {
				ProjectileSpec(248, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, attacknpc, EnemyY, EnemyX);
				calculateSpecial();
				hitDiff = specialDamage;
				usingSpecial = false;
				specialDamage = 0;
				specialDamage2 = 0;
				}
				if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204 && specialAmount >= 100) {
				ProjectileSpec(282, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, attacknpc, EnemyY, EnemyX);
				calculateSpecial();
				hitDiff = specialDamage;
				usingSpecial = false;
				specialDamage = 0;
				specialDamage2 = 0;
				}
				if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587 && specialAmount >= 75) {
				ProjectileSpec(347, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, attacknpc, EnemyY, EnemyX);
				calculateSpecial();
				hitDiff = specialDamage;
				usingSpecial = false;
				specialDamage = 0;
				specialDamage2 = 0;
				}
				if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1434 && specialAmount >= 40) {
				ProjectileSpec(251, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, attacknpc, EnemyY, EnemyX);
				calculateSpecial();
				hitDiff = specialDamage;
				usingSpecial = false;
				specialDamage = 0;
				specialDamage2 = 0;
				}
				if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount >= 25) {
				ProjectileSpec(252, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, attacknpc, EnemyY, EnemyX);
				calculateSpecial();
				hitDiff = specialDamage;
				//hitDiff2 = specialDamage2;
				server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(attacknpc);
				usingSpecial = false;
				specialDamage = 0;
				specialDamage2 = 0;
				}
				if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4755 && specialAmount >= 100 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 					4734 && specialAmount >= 100 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4718 && specialAmount >= 100 || 							playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726 && specialAmount >= 100 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 						4747 && specialAmount >= 100 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 47 && specialAmount >= 100) {
				ProjectileSpec(432, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, attacknpc, EnemyY, EnemyX);
				calculateSpecial();
				hitDiff = specialDamage;
				usingSpecial = false;
				specialDamage = 0;
				specialDamage2 = 0;
				}
				usingSpecial = false;
				specialDamage = 0;
				specialDamage2 = 0;
				specialAttacks();
				specialAttacks2();
				specialAttacks3();
				specialAttacks4();
				specialAttacks5();
				specialAttacks6();
				}

	int casterX = absX;
	int casterY = absY;

	int offsetY = (casterY - EnemyY) * -1;
	if(actionTimer == 0)
	{

	int EnemyY = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY;

            hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);

faceNPC(attacknpc);
//viewTo(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX, server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY);

{
PkingDelay = 18;
wepdelay = 5;
}[/code]

EDIT: I looked and right above,

if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) {
hitDiff = EnemyHP;
}

Was another 1, so I removed it… now I get 2 errors…

[code]client.java:24149: illegal start of type
